The dragon square shield is created by combining the shield left half, a very rare drop from a wide variety of monsters, and the shield right half, which must be purchased from Siegfried Erkle in the Legends' Guild for 750,000 coins or Erdan on the top floor of the Myths' Guild. Item ID1187

The dragon sq shield is the strongest square shield in Old School RuneScape. It requires 60 Defence to wield, along with completion of Legends' Quest. The dragon square shield is created by combining the shield left half, a very rare drop from a wide variety of monsters, and the shield right half, which must be purchased from Siegfried Erkle in the Legends' Guild for 750,000 coins or Erdan on the top floor of the Myths' Guild. The two shield halves are combined at any anvil to produce the dragon square shield, a process that requires level 60 Smithing and grants 75 experience. The dragon sq shield does not protect from dragonfire.

Smithing this shield in West Ardougne is a task required in the hard set of the Ardougne Diary.

A dragon sq shield can be combined with a dragon sq shield ornament kit to make a gold-trimmed dragon sq shield (g). This cosmetic enhancement won't change the stats in any way.

After the completion of Dragon Slayer II, and with level 75 Smithing, the shield may be combined with a dragon metal shard and a dragon metal slice to create a dragon kiteshield.

The dragon sq shield can easily be confused with the unique Anti-dragon shield, which protects against dragonfire. The dragon sq shield does not protect against dragonfire.

[[File:Dragon sq shield detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''dragon sq shield''' is the strongest [[square shield]] in ''[[Old School RuneScape]].'' It requires 60 [[Defence]] to wield, along with completion of [[Legends' Quest]]. The dragon square shield is created by combining the [[shield left half]], a very rare drop from a wide variety of monsters, and the [[shield right half]], which must be purchased from [[Siegfried Erkle]] in the [[Legends' Guild]] for 750,000 [[coins]] or [[Erdan]] on the top floor of the [[Myths' Guild]]. The two shield halves are combined at any [[anvil]] to produce the dragon square shield, a process that requires level 60 [[Smithing]] and grants 75 [[experience]]. The dragon sq shield does '''not''' protect from [[dragonfire]].

Smithing this shield in [[West Ardougne]] is a task required in the hard set of the [[Ardougne Diary]].

A dragon sq shield can be combined with a [[dragon sq shield ornament kit]] to make a gold-trimmed [[dragon sq shield (g)]]. This cosmetic enhancement won't change the stats in any way.

After the completion of [[Dragon Slayer II]], and with level 75 Smithing, the shield may be combined with a [[dragon metal shard]] and a [[dragon metal slice]] to create a [[dragon kiteshield]].

The dragon sq shield can easily be confused with the unique [[Anti-dragon shield]], which protects against [[dragonfire]]. The dragon sq shield does not protect against dragonfire.
